title: George I of Great Britain
summary: George I (George Louis; German: Georg Ludwig; 28 May 1660 – 11 June 1727)[lower-alpha 1] was King of Great Britain and Ireland from 1 August 1714 and ruler of the Duchy and Electorate of Brunswick-Lüneburg (Hanover) within the Holy Roman Empire from 23 January 1698 until his death in 1727. He was the first British monarch of the House of Hanover.
